name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: {"chicken breast": "300g", "fettuccine": "200g", "heavy cream": "1 cup", "Parmesan cheese": "100g", "garlic": "2 cloves", "butter": "2 tbsp"}
instructions: Cook chicken, then make the Alfredo sauce with cream, butter, and Parmesan. Serve with fettuccine.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: {"bell peppers": "2", "broccoli": "100g", "carrots": "2", "soy sauce": "2 tbsp", "sesame oil": "1 tbsp", "garlic": "2 cloves"}
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in sesame oil and garlic, add soy sauce, and serve.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook beef with onions and garlic, add tomatoes to make sauce. Serve with spaghetti.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: {"chicken breast": "200g", "romaine lettuce": "1 head", "Caesar dressing": "3 tbsp", "croutons": "50g", "Parmesan cheese": "50g"}
instructions: Grill chicken, chop lettuce, toss with dressing, croutons, and cheese.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef and onions, make sauce with sour cream and broth. Serve over noodles.

name: Pasta Primavera
ingredients: {"penne pasta": "200g", "zucchini": "1", "cherry tomatoes": "100g", "bell peppers": "2", "garlic": "2 cloves", "olive oil": "2 tbsp"}
instructions: Cook pasta, sauté vegetables in olive oil, toss with pasta.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry eggplant, layer with sauce and cheese, bake.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté mushrooms and garlic, cook rice in broth, stir in cheese.

name: Chili Con Carne
instructions: Cook beef with onions, add beans, tomatoes, and spices. Simmer.

name: Falafel
instructions: Blend ingredients, form into balls, and fry until golden.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, cook in a sauce made with onions, tomatoes, and cream.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef in a skillet until browned, fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and top with sour cream.

name: French Onion Soup
instructions: Caramelize onions in butter, add flour and broth, simmer for 40 minutes, then serve with toasted baguette topped with melted cheese.

name: Shrimp Pad Thai
instructions: Cook noodles, stir-fry shrimp and eggs, mix with noodles, sauce, and sprouts, garnish with peanuts and serve.

name: Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: {"pumpkin puree": "2 cups", "eggs": "2", "sugar": "0.75 cup", "cinnamon": "1 tsp", "pie crust": "1", "cream": "0.5 cup"}
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour into a pie crust, and bake at 180°C for 45 minutes.

name: Fish and Chips
instructions: Coat fish in batter made of flour and beer, fry until golden, serve with fried potato wedges and salt.

name: Ratatouille
instructions: Slice vegetables, layer in a baking dish, drizzle with olive oil and herbs, bake at 180°C for 35-40 minutes.

name: Mango Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth, pour into a glass, and serve immediately.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper, spread on toast and serve.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables, mix with feta and olives, drizzle with olive oil, and serve.
